name: Neant
text: Along the road to reconstruction, the young boy eventually failed.

name: Neant
text: No one was to blame, he simply could not control the perverted [color=red]Desires[/color] that were his.

name: Neant
text: The consequences of a first Destruction, the cycle in full swing, though long after its conclusion.

name: Neant
text: Trapped in an incessant free fall, he never understood.
